content: old man winter brings nothing that this crochet balaclava can t handle designed to cover your head and face this winter must-have will keep you warm protected and in style balaclava is created by stitching in any shade of our machine wash and dry red heart super saver from side to side with single_crochet in the back loop plus short turn row techniques since super saver gives you well over 100 shades to choose from you can make a balaclava for all your friends too sizing women - 19½ -20½ 49 5-52 cm circumference men - 21-22 51 cm circumference kids version https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/ribbed-balaclava-kids
